General.Name: Fujian Green Pine Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Green Pine Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of turpentine derivatives. It offers synthetic camphor and its intermediate products and by-products for use in various applications, including flavors, fragrances, pharmaceutical and personal care products, cleaning supplies, painting and coating fields, etc. The company also engages in the design, research and development, and manufacturing of facial masks, skin care products, wet wipes, and other cosmetics. In addition, it exports its products to approximately 50 countries, including Asia, Europe, North America, South America, Oceania, and Africa. The company was formerly known as Jianyang City Green Pine Chemical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fujian Green Pine Co., Ltd. in May 2009. Fujian Green Pine Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Jianyang, China.
